attributes.action: reverse the decision to close the HMRC Offices in Doncaster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The offices employ around 130 experienced and resourceful staff and are one of the larger employers in a town which is seeing jobs lost at a worrying rate.  Retaining the jobs in Doncaster would see employment remain whilst also reducing the effect moving this number of people would have on the environment through additional journeys. The closures will also see  significant number of staff having to seek alternative employment as they struggle with work-life balance.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reverse the decision to close the HMRC Offices in Doncaster."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18845


Prime Minister's Office
